content.stimulus_en: We (hope) ________ to buy a house.
I (be) ________ going to achieve my goals.
They (ambition) ________ is to help people.
I hope I (travel) ________ around the world.
I (want) ________ to be successful.
She dreams of ________ (be) an artist.
We want to build a better future for our children.
I I'll hope be able to speak English fluently one day.
My biggest dream is to travel across South America.
What your are hopes and dreams for the future?
I'm going to work hard to achieve my ambitions.
She to hopes find a job she really loves.
A future or related word for Sueño/Soñar is '________'.
